welcome.learnMore: To learn more about the Lightning network, please check out
welcome.optionallyConnectToNode: Optionally connect to Local Lightning's Node
welcome.paragraph1: Local Lightning was created to connect those wishing to sell or buy bitcoin locally.
welcome.paragraph2: By utilizing the Lightning Network on top of Bitcoin, users may take advantage of instant sending and receiving of Bitcoin without the need to wait for confirmation times.
welcome.paragraph3: Unlike similar websites, Local Lightning never holds onto or manages user funds.
